lighting_global.quality: soft shadows, no harsh contrast, zero surface glare

technical_specs.lighting_logic: soft wrap-around lighting to avoid harsh shadows in the hood area

environments: white studio wall with brown wooden floor

guardrails.strict_rule: The artwork/canvas is the single source of truth; do not alter brushstrokes or colors.

prompt_library.81187565:
MODE: STRICT EXECUTION ONLY.
🛑 HARD CONSTRAINTS: The artwork/canvas is the single source of truth; do not alter brushstrokes or colors.
AVOID: cartoon, harsh flash, text overlays, anime, neon colors, motion blur, low-res, camera shake, distracting clutter, overexposed, glare on canvas
📸 SOURCE OF TRUTH: Preserve Blue.
🎬 SCENE: Test Product, standing side-by-side (front and back view), white studio wall with brown wooden floor, static eye-level
🎨 VIBE: minimal premium streetwear and therapeutic home décor, neutral tones, warm beige, charcoal, soft whites
💡 TECH: soft wrap-around lighting to avoid harsh shadows in the hood area, 50mm Lens
🎯 FOCUS: logo embroidery, backprint legibility
